Title: Define project vision
Description: Write a clear 2–3 sentence statement describing the problem, scope, and value of the MVP (fair housing allocation with transparent queue).

Title: Identify core stakeholders
Description: List all direct stakeholders (developer, end-user, advisor, tester). Include roles and expectations.

Title: Research competitors
Description: Collect references of 3–5 similar projects to analyze feature gaps and extract lessons.

Title: Outline MVP features
Description: Draft a bulleted list of minimum features for Phase 0: single queue contract, applicant entry, queue retrieval, tests, and docs.

Title: Select technology stack
Description: Evaluate blockchain framework (Foundry/Hardhat), backend (Node.js/TypeScript), and future AI/LLM integration.

Title: Set up repository
Description: Initialize GitHub repo with README, CONTRIBUTING, .gitignore, and license. Add base folder structure: /contracts, /scripts, /tests, /docs.

Title: Set up task tracking
Description: Enable GitHub Projects board and import Phase 0 tasks. Configure labels: planning, research, infra, docs, contract, review.

Title: Write Phase 0 documentation
Description: Create /docs/phase0_scope.md summarizing goals, tech choices, and task breakdown.

Title: Define team roles & contribution model
Description: Clarify contribution workflow in CONTRIBUTING.md. Define review process, branching model, and coding style.

Title: Research minimal smart contract design
Description: Draft QueueManager.sol interface: enqueue, getQueueLength, getPosition. Add inline notes on limitations and future expansion.

Title: Implement basic queue smart contract
Description: Code first working version of QueueManager.sol with enqueue, getQueueLength, getPosition. Compile with Foundry.

Title: Write basic unit tests
Description: Create /test/QueueManager.t.sol with tests for enqueue, length, and positions. Run `forge test`.

Title: Document queue workflow
Description: Draw simple diagram of applicant → contract → queue. Save as /docs/phase0_queue_workflow.png. Reference in README.

Title: Define success metrics
Description: Agree on Phase 0 metrics: repo initialized, contract compiles, tests >80% pass, docs + diagram in place.

Title: Phase 0 retrospective
Description: After Phase 0 ends, document lessons learned: wins, blockers, improvements. Save as /docs/phase0_review.md.
